title: missing mastery token. i think
body:
I just played a game of the featured game mode ascension and played urgot. i am lvl 5 with urgot already and have been for a little bit and i got an s- the game i played. I have yet to receive my mastery token for the match. if needed proof i can screen shot and upload the picture somewhere showing said proof. or am i missing something. can you not loose? can it not be on featured game modes anymore? help would be greatly appreciated in solving the problem

-a very sad urgot

replies.body: Yeeeeaaaa you can't get mastery tokens in the rotating game modes at all as far as I've been aware.
you only get tokens for matchmade games
